goal.en: Students will learn how to analyse the electronic circuits with adequate equivalent models, and will be familiar to the operation modes of the basic electronic components (including the diodes, the BJTs, the FETs, and the OpAmp.). Some fundamental applications of the components will also be covered (including the power amplifiers, oscillators, and the filters).
goal.ch: 培養學生利用簡化等效模型等分析工具，瞭解熟悉各種基本電子元件的工作模式(包含二極體、電晶體、場效應晶體、運算放大器等)，以及相關的基礎應用 (如放大電路、振盪器、濾波器等)。

content.en:
(1). Basic circuits theory
(2). Solid-state diodes and diode circuits
(3). Bipolar junction transistors
(4). Basic BJT amplifiers
(5). Field effect transistors
(6). Operational amplifiers
(7). Digital logic circuits
(8). Frequency response (optional)
(9). Oscillators (optional)
(10). Feedback amplifiers (optional)“
